original_text: I will lead my blind people along ways that they did not know before. I will be their guide, as they walk along paths that are new to them. I will change the dark places that are in front of them, so that they become places with light. And I will cause the rough ground to become flat. Those are the things that I will do for them. I will not leave my people alone. I will lead my blind people along ways that they did not know before. I will be their guide, as they walk along paths that are new to them. I will change the dark places that are in front of them, so that they become places with light. And I will cause the rough ground to become flat. Those are the things that I will do for them. I will not leave my people alone. I will lead my blind people
korean_text: 내가 맹인들을 그들이 알지 못하는 길로 이끌며 그들이 알지 못하는 지름길로 인도하며 암흑이 그 앞에서 광명이 되게 하며 굽은 데를 곧게 할 것이라 내가 이 일을 행하여 그들을 버리지 아니하리니

sentences.original_text: I will lead my blind people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 장님 백성을 인도할 것이다

sentences.original_text: along ways that they did not know before
I will be their guide
as they walk along paths that are new to them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자신에게 새로운 길을 걸어갈 때

sentences.original_text: I will change the dark places
that are in front of them
so that they become places with light
And I will cause the rough ground to become flat
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나는 거친 땅을 평평하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: Those are the things that I will do for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들이 내가 그들을 위해 할 일들이다

sentences.original_text: I will not leave my people alone
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 백성을 혼자 두지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will lead my blind people along ways
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 내 장님 백성을 길따라 인도할 것이다
